body:
prima focus is how dumb their individual actions are than avg cheating.
Tilts towards funny.
The mc literally confessed first. And she picks the other guy. So stupid
There's literally Netorare written on the title. Even it's not in the tag you should know it already
damn cuck missing tag man

@glad1985 How the fuck is this guy worse than your average NTR blackmailer? Those guys literally treat girls like the dirt. This guy did try to tell her, but the girl wanted to seal the deal just the day after confession. Are we also ignoring how she literally just left it to a game to choose between the two? Man would obviously be frustrated that he lost his childhood crush because of dumb luck.
So you’re just gonna push a incorrectly tagged NTR doujin to the popular section knowing full well I blacklisted it? Fml.

Missing tag
Op is a fag
Bro this is what blacklist is for smh
When blacklisting tags doesn't work, just blacklist the author
Bruh no tag the fuck the poster smoking?
I love how well the last page describes the characters "The girl's a pushover, the supposed alpha is just a fucking coward, and the cucked guy is a pretentious dick"
Man, i blacklisted ntr for a reason.
where's the motherfucking tag god dammit
FUCKING TAG NTR GODDAMN IT! I DONT WANT THIS CRAP IN MY FUCKING FEED.
Hmmm the ntr is too weak the girl also doesn't looked that mad and it's missing tags overall trash
Ahhhh a full colored
@glad1985: Nah, they are all the same. What integrity, they got none, none of it.
It's NTR!! Death to NTR!!!

Damn, what a scumbag. He beats your average ntr protag by a mile. Not only he fucks over his brother, instead of some random guy. He straight up rapes his love interest twice, he guilt trip her into thinking it's her fault, he actively pushes the path that will surely result in one thing that she doesn't want - destruction of all of theirs relationship. I think I would rather hang out with your run of the mill blackmailer, than this guy. Those guys seem to have more integrity.

She loves both of them, they both love her. They should just share each other. This is probably going to turn into ntring each other back and forth but how about for once in a ntr where the girl gets shared equally? Especially since they’re brothers

The first volume is just cheating. The real ntr will be when kyousuke forcefully take her back from kousuke, who actually loves her. Or at least that's what I want to see, lol.

Though the end of the vol 2 points towards a totally different direction altogether..

t his doesnt look like it will end well. also the girl is wish washy with her feelings. loves both. leaves it up to a game of chance. both brother should move on. cant wait for the constant ntr back forth. i wonder if Kyosuke even loves her in the first place.
"You should just block the ntr tag if you don't like it even though this website lacks a netori or reverse ntr tag" and then proceeds to not tag ntr garbage.
C'mon man, Netorare is literally in the title. Missing cheating as well
